scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run clean && npm run babel
scripts.pkg: npm run pkg-output && npm run pkg-archive
scripts.pkg-archive: npm run pkg-archive-linux && npm run pkg-archive-macos && npm run pkg-archive-win
scripts.pkg-archive-linux: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-linux-arm64 pkg_archive/den-arm64 && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-linux-x64 pkg_archive/den-x64 && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-cli-linux.zip pkg_archive/den-arm64 pkg_archive/den-x64
scripts.pkg-archive-macos: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-macos-arm64 pkg_archive/den-arm64 && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-macos-x64 pkg_archive/den-x64 && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-cli-macos.zip pkg_archive/den-arm64 pkg_archive/den-x64
scripts.pkg-archive-win: mkdir -p pkg_archive && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-win-arm64.exe pkg_archive/den-arm64.exe && cp pkg_output/dendra-cli-win-x64.exe pkg_archive/den-x64.exe && zip -Djm pkg_archive/dendra-cli-win.zip pkg_archive/den-arm64.exe pkg_archive/den-x64.exe
